transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Hello.
Haan ji.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Theek bhaiya baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji.
Executive: Haan bhaiya ye keh raha tha isme lead nahi aa rahi bhaiya woh pehle jaisi problem hone lagi hai. Beech mein to achi khasi lead aa rahi thi.
Hmm hmm.
Customer: Ab ab pata nahi ab bilkul hi nahi aati aur kal aayi thi bhaiya woh bilkul hi relevant hi nahi thi textile se related. Aisi aisi lead aa rahi hai sir. Haan matlab bilkul hi relevant nahi ho rahi textile se related.
Executive: Kaise lead aa rahi hai ye batao bataoge?
Customer: Kal aayi thi ek lead to unhone matlab unko matlab siliconi machine chahiye tha woh usse related woh machine mein use hota hai machine oil. Ab usme thodi deal karte hain hum.
Hum to textile mein deal karte hain.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Haan. Aur head endorse mein aa rahi hai. Aur sir jab endorse ka head karaya tha dobara.
Hmm.
Customer: Jab jab se endorse ka dobara add karana iski itni sari ekdum se lead aane lag gayi ke door door se woh bhi ek ek kilo ke liye batao.
Isliye maine endorse hatwaya tha kyunki ek ek kilo ki lead aati hai endorse pe bhi.
Executive: Endorse mein bas minimum quantity.
Customer: Endorse ki lead nahi chahiye.
Chahiye hi nahi.
Haan endorse mein bahut hai. Chalo fir isko hata hi dete hain na sir.
Customer: Haan isko hata dijiye sir aap beech mein matlab ye maan lijiye ekdum set ho gaya tha sir ab pata nahi kya ho gaya ekdum se.
Executive: Achanak se abhi to kuch change ment hua nahi jab se matlab bas yahi hai ki ye endorse hata ke dekhte hain. Nahi abhi.
Customer: Abhi kuch din pehle jo aap se meeting kari thi na maine jab aapne kuch woh changes kare the.
Haan haan. Jabhi se jabhi se sir ho gaya ye sab. Bigad gaya.
Customer: Free ho fir abhi?
Sir abhi to main free nahi hun.
Haan. To main ho main kitne time free ho jaunga?
Customer: Kitne time free ho jaoge?
Are facility ke baad free ho jaunga. Tum mujhe Monday fir connect karna kyunki fir 6:30 6:00 baje tak office hota hai.
Executive: 6:00 baje tak hum kya? 7:00 baje ke baad hum chale jate hain na office se. Office to 6:00 baje tak hota hai na sir.
Haan. Abhi tumhara endorse wala hai na? Endorse wala ek minute. Woh endorse wala tha maine non-relevancy kar diya woh maine.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Customer: To theek hai jo ye textile wala textile wale mein kya dikkat aa rahi hai?
Baat ye hai ke sir relevant leads nahi aa rahi hai ek din sir lead aayi thi unhone matlab unko silicon shop mein chahiye tha. Maine usme dekha bhi fir lead unhone mana kar diya ke nahi hume nahi chahiye. Aise aise leads aa rahi hai sir. Haan. Isse pehle sir aap manoge nahi badhiya lead aati thi.
Haan. Aur sir ye badhiya chal raha tha ab ekdum se sab bigad gaya hai.
Executive: Kab se bigad gaya ye batao mujhe?
Customer: Ye abhi se bigad gaya sir jab se woh meeting hui thi na meri aapse usi din se hi.
Executive: To isme keyword change hue hain kya kuch?
Hain?
Customer: Keyword kuch change kiye the kya maine?
Pata nahi sir maine kuch chhedkhani nahi kari.
Executive: Ek second ko main khol leta hun tumhara account. Check kar lijiye.
Ek minute line pe bas ek minute.
Customer: Theek hai sir.
Aur matlab jo order quantity hai woh kaisi aa rahi hai?
Customer: Order quantity sir kuch bhi sahi nahi hai. Jo ab se aa rahi thi order to usme ek ek kilo ki quantity aa rahi hai batao sir.
Ek ek kilo maang rahe woh bhi personal use ke liye.
Achcha. Haan. Is type ki leads aa rahi thi isliye maine hatwaya tha endorse hata dijiye sir beta.
Customer: To aisa karo ye wale jo endorse wale product deactivate karwa do.
Kya sir? Maine. Ye endorse wale product deactivate karwa do. Haan deactivate kar do sir isse aap. Aur ye textile wala hai woh tumhare sare ek baar product check check kar lere. Keyword to dikkat nahi kar raha koi.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
Customer: Chalo dekho tumhara khol main product. Ek second. Actually main niche tha na. Abhi upar aaya hun. Lunch ka kaam ho jata hai na 2 se 3.
Abhi station pe ho tum?
Hain? Abhi station pe ho tum?
Customer: Nahi nahi to aate hue karna hai.
Kya keh rahe ho?
Customer: Main driving kar raha hun abhi raaste mein hun.
Achcha achcha. To kitne time matlab free ho gaye?
Customer: Sir woh to 6:00 6:30 baj jayenge free hoke sir.
6:00 6:30. Chalo main tumhe ek baar call back karta hun abhi. To bhaiya sir subah sham mein 8:00 baje se leke 3:00 baje tak main free rehta hun. Aap is time mujhe contact kar lijiye. Main ek baar dekh leta hun nahi to fir Monday ko fir video meet pe laake main sara kuch dikhata hun fir. Theek hai. Nahi to sir kal mein Saturday hai kal aap dekh lijiyega agar kal ho jaye to. Nahi kal to chutti hai. Saturday Sunday ho jata hai na office. Hmm achcha achcha. Theek hai sir. Ek baar jab tak aap keywords wagera dekh lijiye. Main abhi keywords wagera dekh le raha hun. Baaki ke tumhe fir Monday connect kar lunga main subah. Theek hai theek hai. Okay. Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Leads are irrelevant to textile products.

- Leads are for very small quantities (1 kg).

- Issues started after a recent meeting.



Resolution:

- Agreed to deactivate the 'endorse' product.

- Executive will check the customer's product keywords.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back later.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, keywords, endorse
